::Seekker::
As soon as Seekker heard fight he ran and jumped out of hte ship 
transforming into the left booster of the hover craft.
"lets....haha....go..."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> ::Axis/Lokk::
> 
> The hatch of the ship blasts off, with Axis holding his laser 
cannon 
> in behind. He steps out, and looks around. "Come one guys, this 
> place is awesome!"
> 
> Lokk tries to step out, but Axis was blocking the way, "Hey, Axis! 
> Move out of the way,"
> 
> Axis obliges him quickly, and moves out of the way. "Where to 
> now?" Axis says to Lokk when his friend had left the ship. 
> 
> Lokk smiles, and pulls out a small box, "A portable short range 
> energon scanner." he sets it up in his hand, and turns it on. The 
> display shows high energon levels being emmitted to the north not 
> that far off. "Well, it looks like there is a base or something 
over 
> that direction, and there seems to be large amounts of energy 
> being emmitted, probably in the form of weapons. We should head 
> that direction and find out what's happening." He nods to Axis, and 
> calls to Seekker, "Seekker common we're going north to check out 
> a possible base and fight happening." Axis transforms into his half 
> of the large hover jet, and waits as Lokk forms a right booster. 
> Seekker to form the left booster when he transformed.
> 
>
